code: import{useQuery}from"react-query";import Http from"./http.api";var GetCitiesUrl="http://hamnavazi-api.azurewebsites.net/api/Instrument/Location/GetCitysByCountyId";var getCitiesById=function getCitiesById(id){return Http.get(GetCitiesUrl,{params:{Id:id}}).then(function(res){return res.data.result;}).catch(function(err){return;});};export var useAllCities=function useAllCities(id){return useQuery(["cities",id],getCitiesById,{retry:1,retryDelay:500,refetchOnWindowFocus:false});};
